::Reptilica/Bloodystrike/DevilDuer::

Reptilica growls, looking at Deemos. He really didn't like this bot. Not at 
all.

The Alliance bot lowers altitude, flying behind Deemos, and shooting two 
missiles at the Maximal's back. It was no concern to Reptilica whether Psuedo 
would be hit or not, because Psuedo wasn't an Alliance bot, but if Deemos 
blocked with Psuedo, he'd be caught in the blast also.

Having fired the two missiles, Reptilica flies back up, seeing the Predacons 
retreating. He opens his comm-link. "Hey, Preds," he says into it, sending it 
on a Predacon frequency, "What are you doing? Zardus didn't send us here to 
whoop these Maxi's singlehandedly, ya know, ya gotta help."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike flies in behind Stronghold, DevilDuer coming up behind Blender. 
The two Alliance bots open fire on the two Maximals, aiming for their heads.
